help.title: Help & Documentation
help.description: Find answers and learn how to use StoryCraft Studio.
help.dashboard.title: Dashboard
help.dashboard.content: The Dashboard provides a complete overview of your project. Here you can see key statistics, edit your project's title and logline, and write directly into your manuscript sections.
help.templates.title: Templates
help.templates.content: Templates are pre-defined structures that help you get started quickly. Choose from common narrative structures or genre-specific plots. Applying a template will create a set of sections in your manuscript.
help.outline.title: Outline Generator
help.outline.content: The AI Outline Generator is a powerful tool for brainstorming. Provide a genre and a basic story idea, and the AI will generate a detailed, chapter-by-chapter outline. You can then apply this outline to your manuscript.
help.characters.title: Characters
help.characters.content: This is where you build your cast. Add new characters and fill out their profiles. Use the AI generation feature to create a detailed backstory from a simple concept like 'a veteran knight haunted by his past'.
help.world.title: World Building
help.world.content: Define the setting of your story. You can create multiple worlds or locations, detailing their history, geography, and unique rules like magic or technology systems. The AI can help expand a simple idea into a rich world description.
help.writer.title: AI Writer
help.writer.content: When you're stuck, the AI Writer can help you move forward. Provide it with some context from your story, and ask it to generate a scene description, dialogue between characters, or even a surprising plot twist.
help.export.title: Export
help.export.content: Once you've made progress or finished your work, you can export the entire project. This includes your story details, character profiles, world-building notes, and the full manuscript, all compiled into a single, easy-to-read file.
